title: Exam: Stakeholder Management & Networking
description: Assessment of stakeholder categorization, networking terms, and relative clause precision.

items.explanation: Stakeholders with high influence (power) but low involvement (interest) should be kept satisfied.
items.prompt: According to the stakeholder matrix, which group should be 'kept satisfied'?

items.explanation: Non-defining relative clause with 'who'.
items.prompt: Ms. Gorski, ________ (who) is our primary stakeholder, will be reviewing the budget tonight.

items.explanation: An elevator pitch is a concise and persuasive summary.
items.prompt: What is the term for a short, 30-second introduction used during networking?

items.explanation: To follow up means to contact again.
items.prompt: It's essential to ________ ________ with new contacts within 48 hours of a networking event.

items.explanation: 'Whom' is used formally after a preposition like 'to'.
items.prompt: The director to ________ you were introduced is the head of Operations. (Formal)

items.explanation: Key players have High Power and High Interest and must be managed closely.
items.prompt: How should an administrator handle 'Key Players' in a project?

items.explanation: 'Whose' indicates possession.
items.prompt: The manager ________ department is responsible for logistics is away on leave.

items.explanation: Reciprocity is the practice of exchanging things for mutual benefit.
items.prompt: Which term refers to the professional principle of 'giving to get'?

items.explanation: To reach out is to initiate contact.
items.prompt: Which phrasal verb means to initiate contact with a potential collaborator?

options: The report that I wrote is ready.
The report, that I wrote, is ready.
The report which I wrote is ready.
The report I wrote is ready.
items.explanation: Commas are NOT used with the word 'that' in relative clauses.
items.prompt: Which of these is PUNCTUATED INCORRECTLY?

items.explanation: 'Where' is used for places.
items.prompt: The conference center ________ the event took place was very modern.

items.explanation: Government regulators are external to the company's internal hierarchy.
items.prompt: A government regulator is typically considered what type of stakeholder?

options: The manager who leading the project...
items.explanation: This is a reduced relative clause (Active: 'who is leading' -> 'leading').
items.prompt: Choose the correct reduced relative clause: 'The manager who is leading the project is very efficient.'

items.explanation: 'Buy into' means to support an idea.
items.prompt: We need the finance team to ________ ________ our proposal before we can start.

items.explanation: 'When' is used for time references.
items.prompt: Friday is the day ________ we will touch base with the vendors.

items.explanation: They have high interest but low power to change the outcome, so keep them informed.
items.prompt: A community group affected by a project but with no legal authority has which status?

items.explanation: 'Rapport' refers to a good professional relationship.
items.prompt: Building ________ with stakeholders is crucial for long-term project success.

options: The CEO, who is in London, will attend.
The CEO who is in London will attend.
The CEO, that is in London, will attend.
The CEO who, is in London, will attend.
items.explanation: If there is only one CEO, the information is extra (non-defining) and needs commas. 'That' cannot be used in non-defining clauses.
items.prompt: Which sentence is correct if there is only one CEO in the company?

options: To say something again for clarity
To reach out to a new person
items.explanation: To reiterate means to repeat for emphasis or clarity.
items.prompt: What does the verb 'reiterate' mean?

items.explanation: Omission of the relative pronoun when it is the object.
items.prompt: The contact [that] I met ________ at the conference was very helpful. (Provide the word that can be omitted)
